group_1.textLeft: Alright, there we go...

group_1.textRight: Hey, should I put this bag here, too?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, please!
Wow...thank you very much, you two!
With your help, I was able to grab a@ton of eggs from that limited time sale!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*@You're welcome!
...Your house is quiet today.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, my siblings are out playing.
Well, they’ll be back in no time.

group_1.textRight: It's always so lively here.@It feels a little lonely now.

group_1.textLeft: I'm just happy to get some peace and quiet when@I can. Plus it means I get the kotatsu all to myself!

group_1.textRight: Your family is so big―@Does that mean you guys have to fight for it?

group_1.textLeft: Obviously! It's practically a warzone when@it comes to grabbing certain positions.
The most coveted spot, of course,@is the one nearest the hot water bottle!

group_1.textRight: ...The hot water bottle?

group_1.textLeft: That’s right!
We use a hot water bottle in our kotatsu;@that way we don't need electricity.
It's a brilliant budgeting tip, don't you think?!

group_1.textRight: Electricity is more efficient.@Why don’t you use it?

group_1.textLeft: Well...we could, but...
The price of food has been going up recently,@and it's really squeezed our finances.
That means we have to find@even more ways to save!

group_1.textRight: Is everything okay...?
You guys haven't caught any colds, have you?

group_1.textLeft: No need to worry! My siblings are tough―@They can handle winter!
Well...I’ll admit they seem more comfortable@when they're in the kotatsu,
but they haven’t complained.@The lack of snacks, on the other hand...

group_1.textRight: Aren’t you the one who makes all the snacks?

group_1.textLeft: Yep!
Mom used to make 'em by hand, so I do too!
Except...

group_1.textRight: What happened?

group_1.textLeft: I told my siblings this morning that@making homemade Valentine's chocolates
would be pretty tough to fit in our@budget this year, and they threw a fit,
yelling "I'm not gonna come home today!"@[chara:302001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302001:cheek_0][chara:302001:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:302001:lipSynch_1]and stuff like that.

group_1.textRight: [chara:301651:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...What? You guys got in a fight?!@Are you okay?!

group_1.textLeft: Ha...yeah, of course I am.@It happens all the time.

group_1.textRight: ...Hey, Himika.
Can I...make you guys some@chocolate for Valentine's Day?

group_1.textLeft: No, don't sweat it!
It’s our family philosophy―@Live modestly, but with dignity!

group_1.textRight: But...you were so thrilled when@I brought you that cake.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm glad you gave it to us.
It's just, I can’t always take advantage@of your feelings, you know!
I know they'll get over it.
Just like always, we'll endure and@support each other as a family.

group_1.textRight: Kokoro?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, what is it?

group_1.textRight: Are you still thinking about Himika?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
I...want to help her out somehow.

group_1.textRight: But she told you not to.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, but...it must be really tense and awkward@over there, and...I don't want that.

group_1.textRight: ...You're projecting your experiences@onto them, aren't you?

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha...@[chara:301651:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301651:eyeClose_1][chara:301651:lipSynch_1]You’re probably right.

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:1.0][chara:302951:cheek_0][chara:302951:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json:motion_100][chara:302951:lipSynch_1]What about that?

group_1.textLeft: ...Huh?

group_1.textRight: There. That flyer on the pillar.

group_1.textLeft: What's that...?

group_1.narration: ~Upcoming Charity Bazaar~ @Parents and children are welcome to join!
